articles.title: Donald Trump's ousting is ‘Un-American’...: Vivek Ramaswamy stern ultimatum after Colorado order | Mint - Mint
articles.description: US Presidential Elections 2024: Vivek Ramaswamy pledges to exit Colorado GOP primary if Trump is not allowed on the ballot.
articles.content: US Presidential Elections 2024: Republican Presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy has pledged to exit the GOP primary ballot in Colorado unless former US President Donald Trump is reinstated followin… [+5584 chars]
